attributes.action: STOP THE GOVERNMENT SENDING SILLY LETTERS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please sign to stop silly letters,I have just had one, I get just £45.80 a week benefit and I have a letter asking me why my savings have gone down

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
